Text:
Thanks Alot TvTeam My Favorite Show..
To Bad Its His Final Season With This Series!!!
Why is this being called episode 9 of season 8? This is episode 1 of season 9.

Because it was filmed during the 8th season. Once Bourdain announced he was leaving for another network, they held the remaining episodes of season 8 to broadcast during an abbreviated 9th season. That's why season 8 only had eight episodes, and 9 will only have six.
